definition: slowly, (of tempo) leisurely, a slow section of a pas de deux requiring great skill and strength by the dancers
details:
adverb
- slowly
= example: slowly
adjective
- (of tempo) leisurely
noun
- a slow section of a pas de deux requiring great skill and strength by the dancers
- (music) a composition played in adagio tempo (slowly and gracefully)
= example: (music) a composition played in adagio tempo (slowly and gracefully)
